system.effect: When a Vessel decelerates during an "Adjust Speed and Bearing" or "Evasive Maneuvers" Action, the helmsman gains +10 to the Pilot Test. If test failed by 3 or more degrees, it is damaged, and vessel loses one speed until repairs are made. Poor version is damaged on 2 DoF, Good adds +15 to Test, best adds +15 and is damaged on 4 DoF. Only one per vessel.
